description: Modifies environment variables on windows hosts.

state.description: present to ensure environment variable is set, or absent to ensure it is removed

name.description: The name of the environment variable

value.description: The value to store in the environment variable. Can be omitted for state=absent

level.description: The level at which to set the environment variable. Use 'machine' to set for all users. Use 'user' to set for the current user that ansible is connected as. Use 'process' to set for the current process.  Probably not that useful.
